Чоловіча епіляція не про орієнтацію!: Men's hair removal is not about orientation!
У наш час епіляція/депіляція – одне з пр: Nowadays, epilation / depilation is one of the rules of personal hygiene that appeared with the birth of man and change / supplement over time.
Волосяний покрив на тілі служив нашим пр: Body hair served our ancestors for thermoregulation. With the advent of clothing, vegetation has lost its physiological meaning, and only contributes to the reproduction of microbes. And also, the hair accumulates odor well, which, with increased sweating or an active lifestyle, can cause additional discomfort.
